title: PyTorch build requires Numpy now
body_html:
When I don't have a working numpy dependency detected (due to unrelated shenanigans), the build fails with this:

-- Building version 0.2.0+803afd5
running egg_info
writing torch.egg-info/PKG-INFO
writing dependency_links to torch.egg-info/dependency_links.txt
writing requirements to torch.egg-info/requires.txt
writing top-level names to torch.egg-info/top_level.txt
reading manifest file 'torch.egg-info/SOURCES.txt'
writing manifest file 'torch.egg-info/SOURCES.txt'
running build_ext
-- NumPy not found

....


/private/home/ezyang/pytorch/torch/csrc/generic/Tensor.cpp: In function ‘THCudaTensor* THCPFloatTensor_fromNumpy(PyObject*)’:
/private/home/ezyang/pytorch/torch/csrc/generic/Tensor.cpp:159:3: error: ‘PyArrayObject’ was not declared in this scope
   PyArrayObject *array = (PyArrayObject*)numpy_array;
   ^

And then a big pile of related errors.

CC @colesbury @gchanan

body:
When I don't have a working numpy dependency detected (due to unrelated shenanigans), the build fails with this:

```
-- Building version 0.2.0+803afd5
running egg_info
writing torch.egg-info/PKG-INFO
writing dependency_links to torch.egg-info/dependency_links.txt
writing requirements to torch.egg-info/requires.txt
writing top-level names to torch.egg-info/top_level.txt
reading manifest file 'torch.egg-info/SOURCES.txt'
writing manifest file 'torch.egg-info/SOURCES.txt'
running build_ext
-- NumPy not found

....


/private/home/ezyang/pytorch/torch/csrc/generic/Tensor.cpp: In function ‘THCudaTensor* THCPFloatTensor_fromNumpy(PyObject*)’:
/private/home/ezyang/pytorch/torch/csrc/generic/Tensor.cpp:159:3: error: ‘PyArrayObject’ was not declared in this scope
   PyArrayObject *array = (PyArrayObject*)numpy_array;
   ^
```

And then a big pile of related errors.

CC @colesbury @gchanan
